title: Groundwater Quality Classification and Risk Assessment
description: Developed and deployed ML models (XGBoost, Random Forest, SVM, Logistic Regression) to predict groundwater quality across India. Built a custom Water Quality Index (WQI) risk-scoring algorithm and visualized geospatial contamination risks.

title: Text Classification and Clarity Analysis
description: Built ML and NLP models (Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, BERT) for topic classification, entity recognition, and text clarity analysis. Achieved 78% accuracy using TF-IDF with Logistic Regression and fine-tuned BERT.

title: FIFA Players 2019 Analysis
description: Created an interactive Tableau dashboard analyzing FIFA 2019 players. Included skill comparisons, top players by position, and club-level stats for insights into player performance.

title: Burger Builder
description: Developed a React web app with Redux, Router, and Hooks where users can register, login, and build custom burgers. Integrated Firebase for user management and order persistence.
